hydra.langs.cypher

Class CypherReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • hydra.tools.MapperBase
      • hydra.tools.AntlrReaderBase
        • hydra.langs.cypher.CypherReader

  • public class CypherReader
extends AntlrReaderBase
    A parser which constructs Cypher queries using the hydra/langs/cypher/openCypher model. Notes/limitations: * Many syntax features are not yet implemented; the parser will throw an exception when it encounters them. * The encodings for strings, doubles, and integers are inherited from Java and may not completely agree with the OpenCypher specification.
